00005 #ifndef LUABIND_CONVERSION_STORAGE_080930_HPP
00006 # define LUABIND_CONVERSION_STORAGE_080930_HPP
00007 
00008 # include <luabind/config.hpp>
00009 # include <boost/aligned_storage.hpp>
00010 
00011 namespace luabind { namespace detail {
00012 
00013 typedef void(*destruction_function)(void*);
00014 
00015 // This is used by the converters in policy.hpp, and
00016 // class_rep::convert_to as temporary storage when constructing
00017 // holders.
00018 
00019 struct conversion_storage
00020 {
00021     conversion_storage()
00022       : destructor(0)
00023     {}
00024 
00025     ~conversion_storage()
00026     {
00027         if (destructor)
00028             destructor(&data);
00029     }
00030 
00031     // Unfortunately the converters currently doesn't have access to
00032     // the actual type being converted when this is instantiated, so
00033     // we have to guess a max size.
00034     boost::aligned_storage<128> data;
00035     destruction_function destructor;
00036 };
00037 
00038 }} // namespace luabind::detail
00039 
00040 #endif // LUABIND_CONVERSION_STORAGE_080930_HPP
